means: <摩呵婆罗多>(一译<玛哈帕腊达>
意译为“伟大的婆罗多王后裔”
描写班度和俱卢两族争夺王位的斗争

sentence.Network_en: Themes from the Ramayana and Mahabharata are painted on these cards.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自《罗摩衍那》和《摩诃婆罗多》的主题也描绘在这些扑克上.

sentence.Network_en: The whole Mahabharata is as great as Homer's Iliad.
sentence.Network_cn: 里面有好多好多关于克利须那如何玩弄政治手腕赢得战争的情节.

sentence.Network_en: It would seem that the Mahabharata is describing an atomic war!
sentence.Network_cn: 这像是《摩呵婆罗多》正在描述一场原子战争!

PerfectNetExp.abs: maha 紫面叶猴, mahabharata 摩诃婆罗多, mahabalipuram 马哈巴利普拉姆

means.word_mean: 1. (Hinduism) a sacred epic Sanskrit poem of India dealing in many episodes with the struggle between two rival families

auth_sentence.content: The Mahabharata refers to a child learning from its father while in the womb.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Mahabharata refers to a child learning from its father while in the womb.

auth_sentence.content: Bhagavad Gita The Bhagavad Gita, or "Song of the Lord" is part of the sixth book of the Mahabharata, the world's longest poem.
